tasks.title: Diagnose Agent-Tool Integration Issues
tasks.description: Deploy and verify the simplified agent implementation that resolves the instruction length issue causing communication failures in Cloud Run environment.
tasks.details: Root cause identified: excessive agent instruction length (9,935 chars) caused processing failures. Solution implemented with simplified instructions (~800 chars) maintaining all 12 essential tools. Need to verify deployment in Cloud Run environment and confirm improved success rate.
tasks.testStrategy: Deploy simplified agent to Cloud Run dev environment and verify: 1) Proper tool execution patterns, 2) >50% success rate improvement, 3) No generic 'System health' responses, 4) All 12 tools remain functional.

subtasks.description: Deploy simplified agent to Cloud Run dev environment
Verify agent-tool integration success rate improvement (>50%)
Confirm all 12 tools execute properly in live environment
Document successful patterns for future agent development
Monitor for any remaining silent failures or routing issues

tasks.title: Implement ADK-Compliant Testing Framework
tasks.description: Deploy a comprehensive evaluation system to validate agent-tool integration and performance.
tasks.details: Develop trajectory analysis and quality scoring mechanisms. Create automated validation pipelines for performance benchmarking.
tasks.testStrategy: Ensure the testing framework is fully operational and compliant with ADK standards.

tasks.title: Validate Core Workflow Functionality
tasks.description: Test and validate memory systems, session state management, and basic agent coordination patterns.
tasks.details: Execute baseline performance tests and verify security and compliance standards for core workflows.
tasks.testStrategy: Document core functionality and ensure it meets validation criteria.

tasks.title: Establish Production Deployment Pipeline
tasks.description: Automate deployment processes and implement monitoring and alerting systems.
tasks.details: Set up deployment automation, rollback procedures, and multi-environment validation.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify the pipeline is production-ready with monitoring and alerting operational.

tasks.title: Deploy Travel Orchestrator
tasks.description: Implement the Travel Orchestrator for hotel booking, flight search, and itinerary management.
tasks.details: Develop hierarchical task decomposition for travel-related workflows.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate orchestrator functionality with real-world travel scenarios.

tasks.testStrategy: Test orchestrator with research tasks and validate output quality.

tasks.details: Establish CI/CD integration and task delegation for development workflows.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate orchestrator with development tasks and ensure seamless integration.

tasks.description: Implement the Business Orchestrator for process automation, reporting, and decision support.
tasks.details: Develop workflows for business operations and reporting.
tasks.testStrategy: Test orchestrator with business scenarios and validate decision-making capabilities.

tasks.testStrategy: Validate end-to-end travel planning with multiple agents.

tasks.title: Optimize Performance for 24-Agent Coordination
tasks.description: Maintain performance baseline while scaling to 24-agent coordination.
tasks.details: Implement intelligent caching and resource management.
tasks.testStrategy: Load test with 24 agents and ensure response times remain under 5 seconds.

tasks.testStrategy: Test integrations with real-world scenarios and ensure seamless operation.
